author: Tan Lee Meng J:
casename: Mizuho Corporate Bank Ltd v Cho Hung Bank
counsel: Chou Sean Yu (Wong Partnership) for appellant; Toh Kian Sing and Ian Teo (Rajah and Tann) for respondent
tags-parsed: Conflict of Laws/Natural forum/Application by issuing bank for stay of Singapore proceedings on ground that South Korea more appropriate forum/Whether stay of action should be granted
